verses.verse: Then Job <WH347> answered <WH6030> and said, <WH559>
How long <WH5704> <WH575> will ye vex <WH3013> my soul, <WH5315> and break me in pieces <WH1792> with words? <WH4405>
These <WH2088> ten <WH6235> times <WH6471> have ye reproached <WH3637> me: ye are not <WH3808> ashamed <WH954> that ye make yourselves strange <WH1970> to me.
And <WH637> be it indeed <WH551> that I have erred, <WH7686> mine error <WH4879> remaineth <WH3885> with <WH854> myself.
If <WH518> indeed <WH551> ye will magnify <WH1431> yourselves against <WH5921> me, and plead <WH3198> against <WH5921> me my reproach: <WH2781>
Know <WH3045> now <WH645> that <WH3588> God <WH433> hath overthrown <WH5791> me, and hath compassed <WH5362> <WH5921> me with his net. <WH4685>
Behold, <WH2005> I cry out <WH6817> of wrong, <WH2555> but I am not <WH3808> heard: <WH6030> I cry aloud, <WH7768> but there is no <WH369> judgment. <WH4941>
He hath fenced up <WH1443> my way <WH734> that I cannot <WH3808> pass, <WH5674> and he hath set <WH7760> darkness <WH2822> in <WH5921> my paths. <WH5410>
He hath stripped me of <WH6584> <WH4480> <WH5921> my glory, <WH3519> and taken <WH5493> the crown <WH5850> from my head. <WH7218>
He hath destroyed <WH5422> me on every side, <WH5439> and I am gone: <WH1980> and mine hope <WH8615> hath he removed <WH5265> like a tree. <WH6086>
He hath also kindled <WH2734> his wrath <WH639> against <WH5921> me, and he counteth <WH2803> me unto him as one of his enemies. <WH6862>
His troops <WH1416> come <WH935> together, <WH3162> and raise up <WH5549> their way <WH1870> against <WH5921> me, and encamp <WH2583> round about <WH5439> my tabernacle. <WH168>
He hath put my brethren far <WH7368> <WH251> from <WH4480> <WH5921> me, and mine acquaintance <WH3045> are verily <WH389> estranged <WH2114> from <WH4480> me.
My kinsfolk <WH7138> have failed, <WH2308> and my familiar friends <WH3045> have forgotten <WH7911> me.
They that dwell <WH1481> in mine house, <WH1004> and my maids, <WH519> count <WH2803> me for a stranger: <WH2114> I am <WH1961> an alien <WH5237> in their sight. <WH5869>
I called <WH7121> my servant, <WH5650> and he gave me no <WH3808> answer; <WH6030> I entreated <WH2603> him with <WH1119> my mouth. <WH6310>
My breath <WH7307> is strange <WH2114> to my wife, <WH802> though I entreated <WH2603> for the children's <WH1121> sake of mine own body. <WH990>
Yea, <WH1571> young children <WH5759> despised <WH3988> me; I arose, <WH6965> and they spoke <WH1696> against me.
All <WH3605> my inward <WH5475> friends <WH4962> abhorred <WH8581> me: and they whom <WH2088> I loved <WH157> are turned <WH2015> against me.
My bone <WH6106> cleaveth <WH1692> to my skin <WH5785> and to my flesh, <WH1320> and I am escaped <WH4422> with the skin <WH5785> of my teeth. <WH8127>
Have pity upon <WH2603> me, have pity upon <WH2603> me, O ye <WH859> my friends; <WH7453> for <WH3588> the hand <WH3027> of God <WH433> hath touched <WH5060> me.
Why <WH4100> do ye persecute <WH7291> me as <WH3644> God, <WH410> and are not <WH3808> satisfied <WH7646> with my flesh? <WH4480> <WH1320>
Oh that <WH4310> my words <WH4405> were <WH5414> now <WH645> written! <WH3789> oh that <WH4310> they were <WH5414> printed <WH2710> in a book! <WH5612>
That they were graven <WH2672> with an iron <WH1270> pen <WH5842> and lead <WH5777> in the rock <WH6697> forever! <WH5703>
For I <WH589> know <WH3045> that my redeemer <WH1350> liveth, <WH2416> and that he shall stand <WH6965> at the latter <WH314> day upon <WH5921> the earth: <WH6083>
And though after <WH310> my skin <WH5785> worms destroy <WH5362> this <WH2063> body, yet in my flesh <WH4480> <WH1320> shall I see <WH2372> God: <WH433>

Whom <WH834> I <WH589> shall see <WH2372> for myself, and mine eyes <WH5869> shall behold, <WH7200> and not <WH3808> another; <WH2114> though my reins <WH3629> be consumed <WH3615> within <WH2436> me.
But <WH3588> ye should say, <WH559> Why <WH4100> persecute <WH7291> we him, seeing the root <WH8328> of the matter <WH1697> is found <WH4672> in me?

Be ye afraid <WH1481> of <WH4480> <WH6440> the sword: <WH2719> for <WH3588> wrath <WH2534> bringeth the punishments <WH5771> of the sword, <WH2719> that <WH4616> ye may know <WH3045> there is a judgment. <WH7945> <WH1779>
